title: Ticket #1229: DAGMan node weight
description:
Use case: Looking at a queue of dag nodes, tell how many nodes are waiting for a given job to complete, where waiting means all children and childrens children... 

  A
 B C
  D

DAGMan can decorate A, at submit time, with an attribute denoting how many nodes are waiting for A to complete: DAGManNodesWaiting = 3

B would have DAGManNodesWaiting = 1, as would C, D would have 0.

Given SPLICE DAGs the count should be accurate. A SUBDAG EXTERNAL can count as 1 node.
